column3: Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering
column5: This course delivers understanding of the art of electrical and electronic engineering and an in-depth study of topics covering modern technology for electrical and electronic engineering. It allows for study of a variety of topics, includingElectronic designCommunicationsSoftware engineeringPower generation and distributionElectrical machinesRenewable energy systemsOur objective is to help you develop the confidence to work as a professional, at ease with the conventions of the discipline, and ready to tackle any area of research in electrical and electronic engineering.Key facts
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
